channel.title: How with runserver error
channel.description:
when som1 logs on it gives me this on the run server help would be appreciated
[code]- Hiyascape v2 - .. Online! Connection accepted from *******************: ****. Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at client.<init>(client.java:27147) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:48) at server.run(server.java:192) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
[code]- Hiyascape v2 - .. Online! Connection accepted from ******************: ****. Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at client.<init>(client.java:27147) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:48) at server.run(server.java:192) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: How with runserver error
item.dc:creator: @puresdeath puresdeath
item.description:
@puresdeath wrote:

When someone tries to log on they get an error saying, “Error connection to server. Please try a different world.”[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2008, 05:33:03 PM[/size][hr]there i bleeped out the adress… now help me please?

Read full topic
